html:
11.8.18  7:58 am   have you considered making your lyrics make less sense?

     I feel like they're sometimes confusing because they make too much sense.
11.8.18  7:17 am   Do your songs come out exactly as you imagined them?
11.8.18  7:10 am   Can you give us a random song from your personal playlist/hard drive
11.8.18  6:15 am   Do you make your music all by yourself?

11.8.18  4:17 am   What do you think qualifies someone as a 'musician'?

     Someone who expresses themself through sound, whether it's a child bashing pots and pans together, or a professional woodwind player? or someone who makes a living from their music? or maybe something else entirely?
it's an interesting question that most people have an opinion on and it'd be interesting to hear yours.
11.8.18  3:49 am   you hate outlines now? ? ? ? ?

11.8.18  3:36 am   how would you say your music 'style' has changed over time?

     I've been listening to your songs from 2014 and they sound less complex as if there were less instruments used. but your music is great no matter what

11.8.18  12:29 am   i know that a lot of your songs such as we could just get high or got to know what's going on were written or partially written long before you released them. is the same true of your newer songs and if it is,

     when did you start on them? (particularly interested in hello sexy pants,

      best friends with my own front door,

      and mount st helens is about to blow up)

11.7.18  2:12 pm   Is this theory correct? Long long long journey tells the story of three people. The first one had a dream that was broken, and decided to live in the woods and be spiritual. The second one wanted to be an artist but was not feeling very happy with their life. This is why you say MOST of them were painted by somebody else. They decided to become a movie director and found success. The third person was a musician tha has amnesia and gives information to their family subliminally through music. The chorus links them all together and shows how we can change our lives in order to be happy, and enjoy the long long long journey of life.

11.7.18  1:52 pm   what do you think about me capitalizing the first letter of a word to emphasize it? like, instead of "i learned a LOT", i'll type "i learned a Lot", because i don't like looking at completely capitalized words.

11.7.18  8:33 am   have you considered making parts of your song less meaningful to make the other parts stand out more? I think that's how some people do it.

11.7.18  8:17 am   So a few weeks ago you were wondering if it was better to have the song available before or after the music video was uploaded, because due to all sorts of shenanigans from music provider, having both be released at the same time was impossible. Since the last song was also available before the video, does that mean you picked "before"?

      Follow-up question, do you know that the song video automatically generated by youtube is region locked such that we can only listen to your new song if it's passed midnight in our timezone? Would you be willing to release the song directly on your website at the same time as that song video is generated? That way we could all enjoy your new song at the same time regardless of local time, instead of having to do through silly lengths to bypass the region lock.
